summary:
Recalls MONUSCO's mandate to support Congolese authorities in preventing support to armed groups from illicit activities.

 Stresses the importance of holding accountable those responsible for war crimes and crimes against humanity.

 Expresses full support to the UN Group of Experts and calls for enhanced cooperation.

 Calls upon the Group of Experts to cooperate with other relevant panels of experts.

 Requests States to report on actions taken to implement measures.

 Decides to review measures set forth in this resolution by 1 February 2014.

 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
